description: This file defines an AuthProvider class in Flutter that manages authentication state, including login, registration, and logout functionalities using shared preferences for persistent storage.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A Flutter ChangeNotifier class that manages user authentication state and persists session info using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider and loads saved authentication state.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Getter that returns whether the user is authenticated.

methods.name: username
methods.description: Getter that returns the current username if logged in.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Private method that loads authentication state and username from SharedPreferences.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Simulates user login, sets authentication state, and saves session data.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Simulates user registration and logs in the user.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user and clears session data.
